Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.javaee.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateEJBReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of EJB data (eg, a list of EJB session beans).
    CreateHibernateReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of Hibernate files within the application (eg, session configuration or entity lists).
    CreateSpringBeanReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report on the spring configuration (spring beans, etc).
    DiscoverEjbAnnotationsRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with EJB related annotations, and adds EJB related metadata for these.
    DiscoverEjbConfigurationXmlRuleProvider
    Discovers ejb-jar.xml files and parses the related metadata
    DiscoverHibernateConfigurationRuleProvider
    Discovers Hibernate Configuration Files (eg, hibernate.cfg.xml), extracts their metadata, and places this metadata into the graph.
    DiscoverHibernateMappingRuleProvider  
    DiscoverSpringConfigurationFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers spring configuration XML files, and places the metadata into the Graph.
    DiscoverWebXmlRuleProvider
    Discovers web.xml files, parses them, and places relevant metadata into the graph.
